html.problem:
CheckPoint: Period of an Orbit
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1)
d=lc_choose(a,2700,7800,11300) G=6.67E-11
T= math.sqrt(24* math.pi/ G/ d)
A satellite revolves in a circular orbit around a planet of density $d \(kg/m^3\). The radius of the orbit is twice the radius of the planet. The universal gravitational constant is 6.67 x 10-11 SI units. Find the period of the satellite.
\(T=\)
